title: Publisher Rocket Tutorial - Boost your KDP Keyword Research
description:
Hi Home Bosses,
In this video I want to show you how I use Publisher Rocket and why I think it is a very helpful, time-saving tool that can boost your kdp keyword research. 
There is a special deal on Publisher Rocket for this week only, and you can get the Kindlepreneur Mastering Keywords and Categories Course as a bonus for free when purchasing Publisher rocket during the week from the 25th to the 31st of October 2021. 
(update: this offer has now expired).

Publisher Rocket: https://publisherrocket.com/?affiliate=thehomeboss

FREE Amazon ads course by Kindlepreneur: https://thehomeboss--rocket.thrivecart.com/publisher-rocket/5da9eae7a2e46/

Hope you enjoy the video, if you have any questions, please don't hesitate to leave them in the comments. See you again soon!


If you want to know how to publish your first low content book, start here: https://thehomeboss.com/how-to-publish-your-first-low-content-book-on-amazon-kdp-for-beginners/

❤️ Visit my website: https://thehomeboss.com
